EmailTemplate.subject: Online and Hassle-Free Personal Loans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting RapidAdvance! As I mentioned on the phone, RocketLoans is the newest company in the Quicken Loans Family of Companies. RocketLoans offers an incredibly simple and fast way to consolidate your high-interest credit card debt, pay for a home improvement project, or get extra money for just about anything. You can get approved in as few as 8 minutes. Just visit www.rocketloans.com to get started!
If the majority of your income comes from a sole proprietorship, you will need to provide:
Most recent Tax Form 1040 Tax Form Schedule C 2 Bank Statements
If the majority of your income comes from a partnership, S Corp or LLC, you will need to provide:
Most recent Tax Form 1040 Tax Form 1065 Tax Form Schedule E Tax Form K1 2 Bank Statements
If you have any questions, you can chat online at www.rocketloans.com, email support@rocketloans.com, or call RocketLoans at 1-800-333-ROCK.
